instances.notes: electrodragon; programming via pin header does not work
modified and broken ct-065w eco plug; Has an esp-12 module instead of default because the magic smoke left, and the voltage current sense was cut.

concat: on event#MCPINT_D8=0 do publish cmnd/i3/inside/lights/west/power 0 endon
on event#MCPINT_D9=0 do publish cmnd/i3/inside/lights/west/power 1 endon

commands.payload: sensor29 0,5,0; sensor29 1,5,0; sensor29 2,5,0; sensor29 3,5,0; sensor29 4; sensor29 5; sensor29 6,5,0; sensor29 7,5,0; sensor29 8; sensor29 9; sensor29 10,2,0,0; sensor29 11; sensor29 12; sensor29 13,2,1,0; sensor29 14; sensor29 15

concat: on event#MCPINT_D13=1 do backlog sensor29 3,ON; sensor29 2,OFF endon
on event#MCPINT_D13=0 do backlog sensor29 3,OFF; sensor29 2,ON endon
on Event#glasslock=LOCKED do backlog sensor29 0,ON; sensor29 1,OFF endon
on Event#glasslock=UNLOCKED do backlog sensor29 0,OFF; sensor29 1,ON endon
on Event#aircomp=ON do backlog sensor29 6,ON; sensor29 7,OFF endon
on Event#aircomp=OFF do backlog sensor29 6,OFF; sensor29 7,ON endon

commands.payload: on Mqtt#Connected do backlog subscribe glasslock,stat/i3/inside/classroom/glass-door/lock; publish cmnd/i3/inside/classroom/glass-door/lock; subscribe aircomp,stat/i3/inside/infrastructure/air-compressor/power; publish cmnd/i3/inside/infrastructure/air-compressor/POWER endon

concat: on tele-analog#a0 do var1=((%value%*13)/811) endon
on var1#state do publish tele/i3/inside/commons/front-door-indicator/batteryVoltage %var1% endon
rule1
on tele-analog#a0 do var1=((0.2123*%value%)-22.735) endon
on var1#state do publish stat/i3/inside/sensors/air-line-pressure-%id%/pressure %var1% endon;
rule1 1
rule1
on tele-analog#a0 do var1=((0.1781*%value%)-19.747) endon
on var1#state do publish stat/i3/inside/sensors/air-line-pressure-%id%/pressure %var1% endon;
rule1 1
on switch1#state=0 do backlog publish stat/i3/inside/commons/front-door/lock UNLOCKED; Mem1 UNLOCKED; RuleTimer1 30 endon
on switch1#state=1 do backlog publish stat/i3/inside/commons/front-door/lock LOCKED; Mem1 LOCKED; RuleTimer1 30 endon
on switch1#boot=0 do Mem1 UNLOCKED endon
on switch1#boot=1 do Mem1 LOCKED endon
on Mqtt#Connected do backlog RuleTimer1 30; publish stat/i3/inside/commons/front-door/lock %mem1%; subscribe get_state,cmnd/i3/inside/commons/front-door/lock/query endon
on Rules#Timer=1 do backlog publish stat/i3/inside/commons/front-door/lock %mem1%; RuleTimer1 30 endon
ON event#get_state do publish stat/i3/inside/commons/front-door/lock %mem1% ENDON
ON Switch2#State DO backlog publish cmnd/wood-shop/dust-collector/power ON; publish stat/wood-shop/dc-button-%id%/pressed 1 ENDON
ON Switch3#State DO backlog publish cmnd/wood-shop/dust-collector/power OFF; publish stat/wood-shop/dc-button-%id%/pressed 2 ENDON
ON Mqtt#Connected DO subscribe pow,cmnd/wood-shop/dust-collector/power ENDON
ON Event#pow=ON DO backlog power1 ON; delay 2; power1 OFF ENDON
ON Event#pow=OFF DO backlog power2 ON; delay 2; power2 OFF ENDON
ON Event#pow=1 DO backlog power1 ON; delay 2; power1 OFF ENDON
ON Event#pow=0 DO backlog power2 ON; delay 2; power2 OFF ENDON
ON Switch1#State DO backlog publish cmnd/i3/inside/lights/row4/power ON; publish stat/west-shop/button-box-%id%/01 P ENDON
ON Switch2#State DO backlog publish cmnd/i3/inside/lights/row4/power OFF; publish stat/west-shop/button-box-%id%/02 P ENDON
ON Switch3#State DO backlog publish cmnd/i3/inside/lights/row5/power ON; publish stat/west-shop/button-box-%id%/03 P ENDON
ON Switch4#State DO backlog publish cmnd/i3/inside/lights/row5/power OFF; publish stat/west-shop/button-box-%id%/04 P ENDON
ON Switch1#State DO backlog publish cmnd/i3/inside/lights/row1/power ON; publish stat/east-shop/button-box-%id%/01 P ENDON
ON Switch2#State DO backlog publish cmnd/i3/inside/lights/row1/power OFF; publish stat/east-shop/button-box-%id%/02 P ENDON
ON Switch3#State DO backlog publish cmnd/i3/inside/lights/row2/power ON; publish stat/east-shop/button-box-%id%/03 P ENDON
ON Switch4#State DO backlog publish cmnd/i3/inside/lights/row2/power OFF; publish stat/east-shop/button-box-%id%/04 P ENDON
ON Switch5#State DO backlog publish cmnd/i3/inside/lights/row3/power ON; publish stat/east-shop/button-box-%id%/05 P ENDON
ON Switch6#State DO backlog publish cmnd/i3/inside/lights/row3/power OFF; publish stat/east-shop/button-box-%id%/06 P ENDON
